basic_node.title: Spatial differences in number concentration of atm. particles within particle volume
basic_node.description: Number concentration of atmospheric aerosol particles may vary within particle volume.
basic_node.references: [sp29, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Transmission term T(R): Backscatter coefficient β(R; λ): Number concentration N_j(R); p.9.]
